title: Integrative medicine
description: Integrative medicine combines complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) practices with conventional medicine.
cleaned_text: Print Mayo Clinic's approachA collaborative approachMayo Clinic's integrative medicine specialists are focused on your needs. They work with you and your other members of your care team to provide a holistic approach to encourage healing and wellness. Experience you can trustEach year Mayo Clinic's integrative medicine experts treat thousands of people with a range of approaches that quiet the mind, soothe the body and restore the spirit. Mayo Clinic staff has expertise in resilience training, stress management, meditation, massage therapy, acupuncture, music therapy, animal-assisted therapy, and dietary and herbal supplements. Mayo Clinic is a member of the Academic Consortium for Integrative Medicine and Health. Evidence-based approachThe treatments used by Mayo Clinic's integrative medicine experts have been tested for safety and effectiveness. Mayo Clinic's researchers and health care providers study and improve practices that help people and that can be used with conventional medical treatments. In addition, at Mayo Clinic, people may have access to research activities and clinical trials. The Mayo Clinic experience and patient stories Our patients tell us that the quality of their interactions, our attention to detail and the efficiency of their visits mean health care like they've never experienced. See the stories of satisfied Mayo Clinic patients. New therapies, holistic modalities and hope help photographer see futureHad it not been for the persistence of a co-worker, Jeremy Paterno might be living a different journey. It was the first Tuesday in 2020 when Jeremy Paterno, a photographer at Mayo Clinic in Florida, began noticing some small oddities. "That day, I had a couple flighty moments where my right hand was off, like when I got in the car, but I missed the ignition when trying to insert the key," says Jeremy, a... Locations, travel and lodgingMayo Clinic has major campuses in Phoenix and Scottsdale, Arizona; Jacksonville, Florida; and Rochester, Minnesota. The Mayo Clinic Health System has dozens of locations in several states.
